Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54B South Cicero buses are temp rerouted via: Cicero, 31st, Pulaski, Stevenson Expressway, Cicero, due to, street blockage, near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via:  Cicero, 31st, Pulaski, Stevenson Expressway, and Cicero, due to, street blockage, near Cicero/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Belmont.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Belmont.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
